RYBE69
Boom Blox Bash Party

unlimited camera height [wiiztec]
0401B034 60000000

jingle blox are magnet blox toggle HOME (use on-screen close button to exit home menu) [wiiztec]
2888CE60 00008000
0409B868 901E0014
CC000000 00000001
C209B868 00000003
2C000003 40820008
38000010 901E0014
60000000 00000000
E0000000 80008000
magnet blox were made but utimately scrapped from the final game they're still in the game though and they appear to work fine
when this code is active when any stage with jingle blox is loaded (for editing or playing) the jingle blox will be magnet blox, to prevent this deactivate the code before loading any stage with jingle blox (note: magnet blocks created by the jingle replaced magnet paint will not turn into jingle blox if the stage is loaded with the code deactivated)

E0000000 80008000
press C+- to toggle weither A can be toggled press A if C+- is on to toggle the autofire lazer hose, it's actually an auto fire A button code but it doesn't work well for anything else, when turning off make sure A is off before you turn C+- off
